recevoir

to receive

to receive

reconnaître

reconnaître
to recognize

to recognize

We would recognize this architecture anywhere in the world. (Conditionnel)

recommander

to recommend

to recommend

to think / to reflect

to think / to reflect

to regret

to regret

remettre

remettre
to put back / to give back / to postpone
